item.title: Developing using Docker inside of a container
item.description: For the last six years or so I’ve been running Fedora Atomic as my daily driver; an immutable version of Fedora that uses Flatpaks and containers rather than installing packages to the host OS. One complication is that so many projects use Docker, and running Docker from inside a container is generally not supported. Fortunately for us, flatpak-spawn lets us run binaries on the host OS and pass their output into the container.
